name: It's Just Your Imagination
effect: Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

name: Disengage
effect: After combat: Choose an empty space in this fighter's zone. Place this fighter in that space.

name: Savagery
effect: After combat: If you won the combat, deal 1 damage to each fighter adjacent to Bigfoot.

name: Hoax
effect: After combat: Move your fighter up to 5 spaces. You may move that fighter through spaces containing opposing fighters.

name: Jackalope Horns
effect: Move the Jackalope up to 5 spaces. You may move the Jackalope through spaces containing opposing fighters. Then deal 2 damage to any one fighter adjacent to the Jackalope.

name: Crash through the trees
effect: Move Bigfoot up to 5 spaces. You may move Bigfoot through spaces containing opposing fighters.

name: Skirmish
effect: After combat: If you won the combat, choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 2 spaces.

name: Momentous shift
effect: During combat: If your fighter started this turn in a different space, this card's value is 5 instead.

name: Feint
effect: Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

name: Reqroup
effect: After combat: Draw 1 card. If you won the combat, draw 2 cards instead.

name: Wily fighting
effect: After combat: Deal 1 damage to each adjacent fighter.
